intro: Stellaria radians, commonly known as starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the Caryophyllaceae family. It is characterized by its delicate, star-shaped white or pink flowers that bloom in early summer. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a soft, hairy texture. Stellaria radians is often found in temperate regions of Europe and Asia, where it thrives in nutrient-rich soils.
